text: A rift providing passage for Nagash's faction. [[col:magic]]This rift can only be entered by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero belonging to Nagash and cannot be closed.[[/col]]
This mountain pass can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between Deff Gorge and Desolation of Nagash
